mutants.mutated_line: return {'': sum([has_number, has_uppercase, has_lowercase, has_special, has_min_length]), 'suggestions': suggestions}
return {'strength': sum([has_number, has_uppercase, has_lowercase, has_special, has_min_length]), '': suggestions}

mutants.original_line: suggestions.append('Add at least one uppercase letter.')
suggestions.append('Add at least one lowercase letter.')
suggestions.append('Add at least one special character.')
suggestions.append('Increase password length to at least 8.')
